text:
– Eu... bem, não sei explicar direito. Foi estranho, no início me senti doente e cansado o tempo todo, sem contar o apetite que duplicou. Minhas emoções se tornaram uma bagunça, eu chorava por tudo. Mas depois, só tive que me acostumar com os chutes e com o fato de que estava ficando cada vez maior. – contei, ainda olhando para [redacted_name]. Já estou começando a me irritar. – Mas depois de tudo, valeu apena.
– Uau, deve ter sido difícil. – comentou [redacted_name].
– Você não faz ideia, colega. – disse [redacted_name], entrando na conversa, enquanto enchia a boca com mingau de aveia.
Olhei para ele e não pude deixar de corar ao me lembrar de tudo o que ele me falou. Voltei a olhar para [redacted_name]. Mas que droga, ontem ele disse que me ama e agora mal olha para mim!
trans:
– I... well, I don't know how to explain it properly. It was weird. At first, I felt sick and tired all the time, not to mention my appetite doubled. My emotions were all over the place, I cried about everything. But then, I just had to get used to the kicks and the fact that I was getting bigger and bigger. – I confessed, still looking at [redacted_name]. I'm already starting to get annoyed. – But in the end, it was worth it.
– Wow, that must have been tough. – [redacted_name] commented.
– You have no idea, friend. – [redacted_name] said, joining the conversation while stuffing their mouth with oatmeal.
I looked at him and couldn't help but blush, remembering everything he said to me. I looked back at [redacted_name]. But what the hell, yesterday he said he loved me and now he barely looks at me!
